Replace.Text: Well, please advise
Now is not the time to talk about this
Whatever responds to me, please become... my strength, so that I can better protect you.
give it to me
I won't back down again!
This is your end!
Well, the Eye of Deep Space welcomes your arrival.
You're in such a hurry, are you going to take me out to eat? (deliberately changing the subject)
This is a small gift I prepared myself. Please accept it.
I have never done anything to offend you.
You will pay the price
Eyes of the Deep Space, Verdandy, hello, stranger.
Would you like to visit Ain Sofi?
Sure, do you have a...barbecue restaurant here?
Beautiful city, it reminds me of where I used to be...
I don't accept provocations. If you want to start a war, come on.
I hope you can keep your promise
This is the territory of our Deep Space Eyes
Don't blame me for being rude.
Your behavior is no different from Shi Hai. Please ask your intelligence agents to leave Ain Sofi!
it turns out....
The belief of protection cannot be changed!
This will only hurt you.
Admin...still waiting for me...
Yeah, thank you.
Yeah, thank you.
Yeah, thank you.
It's ok, let's wait until next time
It's okay, let's wait until next time
It's okay, let's wait until next time

The wishes I made easily at that time, such as "protecting everyone", now seem really beautiful, but also very difficult. However, I believe that as long as we are still together, these wishes will definitely come true.
You are Verdandy's best neighbor.

In addition to having the leader skill of Darkly Verdandi, you will initially gain +4 [ICON_VisLimited] diplomatic visibility and 1 spy (and increase spy capacity by 1). All units gain [ICON_Movement] no movement cost when embarking or disembarking, and +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending. After researching {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME}, all units will have the ability to enter coastal and ocean cells. +2 [ICON_Faith] faith to all cells in the city, and each government will gain an additional general slot. -4 levels of espionage in the territory, reduced spy action time by 75% and no time cost when deployed in other cities, and when an offensive spy mission is successful, gain [ICON_Gold] gold and 1000% of [ICON_Faith] faith value in the target city for that round. Wonders and buildings with two or more [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] great work slots automatically gain [ICON_ThemeBonus_Active] theming. +3 [ICON_Food] for all [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] artifacts +3 [ICON_Food] for food +3 [ICON_Production] for productivity +3 [ICON_Gold] for gold coins. -100% [ICON_Gold] cost for purchasing Theater Square area buildings and Archaeologists, +20 [ICON_Movement] for Archaeologists
The moment of glow
Verdandy (Song Elf)
Verdandy (Old Vow)
I know my identity and mission.
Verdandy (Hymn Elf) Initial Intelligence Advantage
Use the Deep Space Eye Leader Verdandi (Hymn Elf)
Agent Kolge sent a secret message
+{1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, from Verdandi (Hymn Elf) leader trait
